snippet: In a district near Albany that was designed by Republicans, Cecilia F. Tkaczyk’s opponent concedes months after Election Day.
abstract: Democrat Cecilia F Tkaczyk is declared winner of State Senate seat in newly drawn Republican-friendly district in Albany area; Republican opponent George A Amedore Jr concedes, 73 days after election, when counting of contested ballots is completed.
lead_paragraph: In a district near Albany that was designed by Republicans, Cecilia F. Tkaczyk’s opponent concedes months after Election Day.

headline.seo: Cecilia Tkaczyk, Democrat, Ekes Out Victory in Republican Senate District
